title: LFM - Supp and Subs for other Rolles
body:
Hey guys I'm Deep Sanity,
So im looking for a Supp and subs for other positions for a ranked team for silver+ only maybe high bronze for some exception.
We have only just started this ranked team and we are still in provisionals.
I have an experience in ranked teams, i have been playing in teams since late s3.
I am Silver 5 and heading up, but i have alot more to improve in and i think it would be better in a team.
also communication will be a vital in this team so we will use either skype teamspeak or curse.
i will make up a schedule for when games will be made if needed.

Top - Taken
Jungle - Taken - Sub Needed
Mid - Taken - Sub Needed
Adc - Taken - Sub Needed
Supp - Free - Sub Needed

Feel free to add me in game or just make a post in here - Thanks :)
- Deep Sanity

replies.body: hey dude i would love to be jungle sub
I main support. I am also silver and yeah I main support! Added you in game let me know please :)
I can take supp, I'm happy to take things seriously as long as theres no real negativity. G5 atm, I've been looking for a team for a while so if I can help you out add me in game ey :)
